item.title: New York’s famed Park Avenue is getting a new Kimpton hotel
item.description: Designed to feel like a New York City townhouse, the new Kimpton Ashbel will open in November.

item.title: Breeze Airways revamps rewards program with elite status tiers, new perks
item.description: Breeze Airways will revamp its frequent flyer program, adding new perks along with elite status tiers and benefits.

item.title: Wyndham launches a travel and entertainment subscription with a limited-time 7,500-point bonus
item.description: Wyndham just launched a new Wyndham Rewards Insider subscription that provides travel and entertainment benefits that extend far beyond Wyndham stays.

item.title: Are premium credit cards worth the annual fee?
item.description: Premium travel cards offer big perks — but only if you use them. Here's how to decide if top cards like the Amex Platinum or Sapphire Reserve are wort...

item.title: Earning rewards on your business spending? Here's how to redeem for the best value
item.description: If you want to really get outsize value from your business card, the key is redeeming your points or miles in a smart way.
